name: The Afgan Rug Shop
address: The Afghan Rug Shop, 7 Market Street, Hebden Bridge HX7 6EU
about: The Afghan Rug Shop in Hebden Bridge can call itself unique for several reasons. It’s believed to be the only rug shop outside Afghanistan itself that sells rugs solely from that country.

name: Totally Awesome
about: Based in vibrant Hebden Bridge and the Historic Piece Hall in Halifax, Totally Awesome offers a fun shopping experience allowing you to try many of the products on offer, products which often can’t be found on the high street.

name: The Egg Factory
address: Windsor Works Adj. Unit,, Victoria Rd, Hebden Bridge HX7 8JX
about: The Egg Factory is a creative co-working space in Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire. Become part of our community today and work alongside like-minded creatives to help your small business flourish.
